DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Data Domain Repeat Eligibility Determination Laboratory Test Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indication of the reason why eligibility confirmation lab tests were repeated.

PermissibleValues.value: More than 7 days have elapsed between eligibility studies and anticipated treatment start

PermissibleValues.value: Repeated eligibility studies outlined in the protocol are outside the parameters required for eligibility
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Repeat Essential Laboratory Test Finding External To Parameter

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Repeat Essential Laboratory Test Finding External To Parameter
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Make or do or perform again.: Absolutely or vitally necessary; indispensable.: A character or string that represents the full name of the laboratory assessment.: Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.: Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: A Parameter is a replaceable value in a Parameterizable class.  Examples of Parameters include: scanning wavelength, laser power, centrifuge speed, multiplicative errors, the number of input nodes to a SOM, and PCR temperatures.

Concepts.definition: Make or do or perform again.
A character or string that represents the full name of the laboratory assessment.
Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.
Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
Any factor that defines a system and determines (or limits) its performance.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.
